availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Virginia. Worked as a carpenter in Louisville in 1860.

Spouse: Zerelda Dozier
Children: Ann Dozier, James Dozier

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 1, page 23.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 2, page 27.
U.S. Find a Grave Index, 1600-Present, James C Dozier, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=DOZ&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSsr=81&GRid=94885181& accessed 05/22/2017.
